name: Vengeance of the Tree
description:
Credits

-https://kabaakk.itch.io/

-https://ismet-akgul.itch.io/

Shoot your way through monsters to reach the end of the level.

WASD to play left click to shoot, right click to shoot a wall. 

After defeating enemies drag to sling your seed across the area to reach new places.

Have fun.

Made for GGJ 23 in two days
